string.value: Soho is a trademark of Monotype Imaging, Inc and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT
This typeface is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc. and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this typeface software either directly from Monotype Imaging or together with software distributed by one of the licencees of Monotype Imaging.
